title: 625. Reese's Senior Bowl Roster Reveal Show
itunes:title: 625. Reese's Senior Bowl Roster Reveal Show
description:
Daniel Jeremiah, Bucky Brooks and Rhett Lewis are joined by Reese's Senior Bowl Executive Director Jim Nagy on this special episode of Move the Sticks, as the Senior Bowl rosters are revealed. The guys dive into the acceptances and players for each position group throughout the show. First, they talk with Florida quarterback Kyle Trask about his impressive season and preparation process (4:34). Next, the guys are joined by Oklahoma State wide receiver Tylan Wallace as he explains the strengths of his game (16:21). Then, they speak with Notre Dame head coach Brian Kelly, as six players from Notre Dame were invited to the Senior Bowl (24:41). Later, the guys speak to Wake Forest defensive end Carlos "Boogie" Basham Jr. as he discusses battling COVID-19 (35:44).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
